long_description: With a soft, sun-protective fabric and lots of convenient pockets, the casual Royal Robbins Convoy Shorts make a day around town comfortable and fun. Lightweight blend of polyester, cotton and nylon resists wrinkling and dries fast when wet. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Back right pocket zips closed while the back left pocket has a rip-and-stick closure to secure items; shorts include hand pockets and a drop-in cell phone pocket. Hidden zippered pocket keeps valuables or sensitive documents tucked away. Royal Robbins Convoy Shorts have a regular fit.
